name: game_key
description: Unique identifier from source mapping to 'eid' field in API

name: o_u
description: O=OVER; U=UNDER; only populated when odds_type=TOTALS

name: odds_mtid
description: mtid is SBR key representing a combo of period_type & odds_type

name: period_type
description: betting period - ie FULL=full game odds;

name: odds_type
description: Money Line, Spread or Totals line;

name: epoch_timestamp
description: Line timestamp from source in epoch

name: wagers_perc
description: Percentage of wages on this line; Inverse line on other team/ou will match the inverse of this percent

name: wagers_count
description: Total wagers on this line; Wager Percent a calculation of this total
